estonian.CopyLink: Kopeeri WMS'i või lehekülje aadress vahemällu
estonian.Resample: Lülita pildi pehmendus välja. Mõjub hetkel vaid NDVI pildile
estonian.ExportPGW:
Salvesta ekraanipilt, PNG formaadis koos asukohainfoga
Võimalik kasutada ka GIS rakenduses
Nõuab veebilehitselalt mitme faili alla laadimise luba.
estonian.DeadTrees:
Automaatselt tuvastatud surnud puude asukohad Eestis.
Arvutatud suvise lennu ALS andmete laekumisega (Maa-amet, katsetuslik kaardikiht)
estonian.Mask-4: Üle 10 m suvise taimkattega alad 2018 - 2021 / Maa-amet
estonian.Mask-5: Alla 1 m suvise taimkattega alad 2018 - 2021 / Maa-amet
estonian.Mask-6: Üle 10 m suvise taimkattega alad 2008 - 2020 / Maa-amet
estonian.Borders-5: Metsateatiste ja raiega MKE-de piirid / Keskkonnaagentuur
estonian.tableInfo:
Vali menüüdest pildi jaoks spektrikanalid ja 
muuda liuguritega kanalite heledusi.

Pildi jagamiseks kopeeri aadressriba sisu.

english.CopyLink: Copy WMS or page link to clipboard
english.Resample: Toggle image resampling off. Currently affects only the NDVI image.
english.ExportPGW:
Save screenshot, PNG format with location info.
Can also be used in GIS applications.
Requires permission for multiple file downloads on web browser.
english.DeadTrees:
Automatically detected locations of dead trees in Estonia.
Calculated with the arrival of summer flight ALS data (Land Board, experimental map layer)
english.ETC: Beehives / Agricultural Registers and Information Board
english.Orto-2: Summer vegetation index NDVI 2021 / Land Board
english.Mask-0: Forests according to ETAK / Land Board
english.Mask-1: Water bodies according to ETAK / Land Board
english.Mask-2: Wetlands according to ETAK / Land Board
english.Mask-3: Open areas according to ETAK / Land Board
english.Mask-4: Areas with vegetation over 10 m high 2018 - 2021 / Land Board
english.Mask-5: Areas with vegetation under 1 m high 2018 - 2021 / Land Board
english.Mask-6: Areas with vegetation over 10 m high 2008 - 2020 / Land Board
english.Borders-1: State forest area boundaries / Environmental Board
english.Borders-2: Private forest area boundaries / Environmental Board
english.Borders-4: SPAs protective forest boundaries / Environmental Board
english.Borders-5: Boundaries of forest notifications and areas under harvesting permits / Environmental Board
english.Borders-6: Farmland boundaries / Agricultural Registers and Information Board
english.Borders-8: Black and white base map / Land Board
english.Borders-9: Boundaries of soil types / Land Board
english.tableInfo:
Choose spectral channels for the image from the menus and 
adjust the brightness of the channels with the sliders. 

To share the image, copy the content of the address bar.
